ARABIC: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No one besides Allah can unveil it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is no one to unveil it apart from God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and none but Allah can avert it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: No one besides God can rescue a soul from hardship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: None except Allah can avert it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: None besides Allah can avert it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: There shall be none besides Allah to remove it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: apart from God none can disclose it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: None beside Allah can disclose it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: None but God can avert it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: None, except Allah, can avert it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is none who may unveil it besides Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: No (soul) but Allah can lay it bare.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: None besides Allah can avert it, (or advance it, or delay it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: none except Allah can disclose it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: None besides God can unveil it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:58] None, [no] soul, besides God can disclose it, that is to say, only He can disclose it and manifest it, as where He says: He alone shall reveal it, at its proper time [Q. 7:187].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (None beside Allah can disclose it) none except Allah can reveal its advent and exact time.
